articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Combined Foodstuff-processing Factory of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Combined Foodstuff-processing Factory of KPA
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army  Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and  first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, gave field guidance to the Combined Foodstuff-processing Factory under KPA Unit 534 which has been updated at the highest level.
					 Enjoying a panoramic view of the factory, he was very pleased to see it, saying that it looks very nice as outer walls of all its buildings are covered with tiles to meet the requirements of architectural style, its appearance has been radically face-lifted and his visit to it proved fruitful.
					
					 Looking at persimmon trees in the compound of the factory heavily laden with fruits, he said that it is a very high yield and it is fantastic to watch the updated factory. The factory which leader Kim Jong Il praised for its successful greening is distinguished, he added.
					
					 "KPA Unit 534, officials and employees of the factory and scientists and technicians of the relevant unit have successfully carried out the tasks for updating the factory given by me when visiting it in May last year and it is a proud patriotic creation made thanks to the might of the great army-people unity", he noted, and went on:
					
					 "How Kim Jong Il would have been pleased if he had seen the factory which has been updated at the highest level as he noted with so great joy that it became possible to provide more essential foodstuff to servicepersons after turning the factory which once froze and salted fishes only into a combined foodstuff-processing base. Watching the factory, I feel my heart ache at the thought of Kim Jong Il."
					
					 He went round the essential foodstuff shop, maize-processing shop, rice-polishing shop, vegetable-processing shop and instant rice shop to learn in detail about their updating.
					
					 Noting that the combined production control system for production and management which has been put on a high IT and intellectual basis is impeccable and it is nice to see the automated, unmanned and streamlined production processes, he said it is like singing and cheerful to work there.
					
					 "The modernization of all processes ranging from cereals and other things' feeding to forwarding of goods made it possible to remarkably increase the production of foodstuff and improve its quality while saving manpower and worksites have become germ- and dust-free to fully ensure hygienic safety of products", he stressed.
					
					 He saw varieties of foodstuff produced by the factory.
					
					 Saying that he had a taste of soup prepared by various methods with soybean paste produced by February 20 Factory of the KPA and he found it very delicious, he promised to taste the soybean paste produced by the combined foodstuff-processing factory in future as people say it is more delicious.
					
					 Recalling that production did not stop at the factory even a single day under the special care of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un underscored the need for the factory to keep its production going at a high rate in line with its updating according to the standard set by the party and thus eternally add shine to the exploits Kim Jong Il performed by bringing about a radical turn in the production of essential foodstuff.
					
					 He promised with loving care to personally settle all problems arising in managing the factory including the supply of cereals and other things.
					
					 Saying that he was satisfied to visit the factory and he became high-spirited these days, he noted that this year became a year for consolidating the foundation of supply bases for the service personnel as the supply bases of the KPA including this factory have been updated, foreseeing the distant future.
					
					 The People's Army is taking the lead in developing the foodstuff-processing industry and it is the traditional mode of work for the WPK to create a typical unit and generalize it, he said, instructing all units including civilian foodstuff factories to intensify the drive for modernization following the work style of the People's Army.
					
					 Noting that it is important to have a Juche-oriented viewpoint and stand on the modernization, he called for pushing forward the modernization on the basis of high national self-esteem and ardent patriotism.
					
					 The Korean people's creative wisdom and enthusiasm are inexhaustible, he noted, calling for giving the fullest play to them and working hard with a high goal and ambition to surpass the world level.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and Army Col. General So Hong Chan, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces.

articles.title: Special Envoy of Kim Jong Un Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Kim Jong Un Leaves for Russia
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), left here Monday by a special plane to visit the Russian Federation as a special envoy of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Also leaving here together with the special envoy were Kim Kye Gwan, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, No Kwang Chol, vice-chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, and officials concerned.
					
					 They were seen off at the Pyongyang International Airport by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Su Yong, minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economic Relations, Kim Song Nam, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Greetings to Oman Sultan
articles.content:
Greetings to Oman Sultan
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Qaboos Bin Said, sultan of Oman, on its national day.
					 The message wished the sultan and his people successes in their work to build modern and prospering Oman, expressing belief that the excellent bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would continue developing on good terms.

articles.title: Opening New Phase for Independent Reunification, Peace and Prosperity Called for
articles.content:
Opening New Phase for Independent Reunification, Peace and Prosperity Called for
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- November 17 this year marks the 109th anniversary since the Japanese imperialists fabricated the "Ulsa Five-point Treaty", wantonly violating the sovereignty and dignity of the Korean nation that had lived the history spanning 5 000 years.
					 The north side's Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation and the south side's Council for the Peaceful Unification of Tangun's Nation made public a joint appeal Monday. It said:
					
					 Due to the illegal treaty which the Japanese imperialists fabricated in a gangster-like manner at the point of bayonets, the Korean nation had its country usurped to be forced into slavery under the harsh colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Japan still behaves so impudent as to distort history and move to seize Tok Islets, far from making due apology and reparations for their past crimes. This only adds crimes to what it had committed against the Koreans.
					
					 The situation demands the Koreans put an end to outsiders' domination and interference, defend dignity and sovereignty of the nation and achieve the historical cause of national reunification, rallied close as one.
					
					 In order to fulfill one's duty as a member of the Tangun nation in response to this call of the times reflecting the requirements and desire of the fellow countrymen, the Councils strongly appealed to all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad as follows:
					
					 Let's reject aggressive outsiders and firmly maintain the stand of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Independence is what keeps the nation alive and dependence on outsiders is what leads the nation to ruin.
					
					 Let's kindle higher the flame for independence against outsiders and resolutely foil Japan's ambition for reinvasion of Korea and its moves for seizing Tok Islets.
					
					 The driving force of national reunification is all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad.
					
					 The reunification of the country can be achieved independently in line with the interests and requirements of the nation only when the stand of By Our Nation Itself is strictly maintained.
					
					 Let's never tolerate the traitorous moves of the sycophantic and conservative forces aimed to push the nation into ruin through "cooperation" with outsiders out of the stand of flunkeyism and dependence on them.
					
					 Let's turn as one in the struggle to defend the security and peace of the nation.
					
					 Let all the Koreans valuing justice and peace unite as one and resolutely foil the reckless nuclear war exercise moves of the U.S. and bellicose forces.
					
					 Let all the Koreans turn out in the struggle for ending confrontation between the fellow countrymen, slandering the other side and for warming the north-south ties as early as possible.
					
					 Let's resolutely foil the leaflet-scattering operations and "human rights" racket which are harmful to converting the north-south relations into those of genuine reconciliation and confidence.
					
					 National unity precisely means peace and reunification.
					
					 Whoever is a member of the Tangun nation truly loving the country and the nation and wishing for reunification should get united by placing the interests common to the nation and national reunification above all irrespective of differing ideology, ism, political view, religious belief, social system, party and affiliation.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad who are descendents of Tangun!
					
					 Let all of us pool efforts with our own efforts, overcome difficulties and trials lying in the way of national reunification, wage more fierce struggle for implementing the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and thus open up a new phase of independent reunification and peace and prosperity without fail on this land.
					
					 Let everyone devote one's own wisdom, efforts, sweats and sincerity to the cause of national reunification with patriotic mind and thus provide our descendents with one, reunified motherland.

articles.title: First Term of Recreation Starts at Yonphung Scientists Rest Home
articles.content:
First Term of Recreation Starts at Yonphung Scientists Rest Home
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- The first term of recreation started at the Yonphung Scientists Rest Home on Sunday.
					 The first batch of recreationists was warmly greeted by officials and employees of the rest home.
					
					 They paid tributes to portraits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the general service center they felt more keenly the love of Marshal Kim Jong Un who has made this year the one for scientists with his great politics of attaching importance to science and talents.
					
					 They had a pleasant time at the indoor wading pool and multi-purpose outdoor sporting ground.
					
					 They spent a good day, playing amusement games and singing songs.

articles.title: 18th National Exhibition of Sports Scientific and Technical Successes Opens
articles.content:
18th National Exhibition of Sports Scientific and Technological Successes Opens
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- The 18th national exhibition of sports scientific and technological successes opened Monday with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House here.
					 Displayed there are more than 180 computer programs presented by over 200 units including sports domain,  commissions, ministries, national institutions and scientific and educational domains, over 1,000 scientific and technical successes including  athletic equipment, measuring instruments, medicaments, books and papers.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Han Kwang Bok, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and those in the sports domain and working people.

articles.title: Newly Unearthed Remains and Relics on Display to Disclose Japan's Atrocities
articles.content:
Newly Unearthed Remains and Relics on Display to Disclose Japan's Atrocities
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- Newly unearthed remains and relics were displayed at the National House of Class Education to bear witness to the Japanese imperialists' thrice-cursed atrocities.
					 In recent days an abandoned pit was found in Sogo-ri, Chonma County, North Phyongan Province in the course of ore prospecting. Remains of 338 bodies and more than 300 relics were found in the pit 78 meters long, 2 meters high and 1.8 meters wide. 
					
					 Mitsui and other Japs developed 46 gold and silver mines in Chonma area (Koryongsak-myon at that time) and looted more than one ton of gold and other natural resources every year by forcing Koreans to slave before the liberation of Korea.
					
					 Local inhabitants testified to the fact that Mitsui blew up the entries of some pits with rich ore deposit, leaving them buried, when the defeat of the Japanese imperialists was certain.
					
					 There was a lot of evidence proving the barbarous murder committed by Japs in the pit. They included skulls ridden with bullets, bullet-lodged femora, empty cartridges and blind bombs.
					
					 Unearthed there were rubber shoes, work shoes and dozens of sets of spoons and chopsticks, buckles with the Mitsui company trademark, wood cards of conscripted laborers, buttons, etc.
					
					 All evidence clearly proves that Japs shot to death the drafted workers, miners and even their families after throwing them into the pit in a bid to conceal the pits and left them buried.

articles.title: Japan's Tourist Attraction Stained with Koreans' Blood
articles.content:
Japan's Tourist Attraction Stained with Koreans' Blood
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- Matsushiro in Nagano City, Nagano Prefecture, Japan is one of tourist attractions noted for sightseeing of blossoms, hot spring and historical relics.
					 But not many people know that the attraction was permeated with blood and sweat of Koreans forcibly drafted to Japan from the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 In November 1944, Japan took a large number of Koreans to the project for underground imperial headquarters in Matsushiro.
					
					 The Japanese overseers drove those Koreans to toilsome work from 4 a.m. They beat them to death and threw them alive into concrete mixture on the pretext that they did not meekly obey them. They did not even allow the burial of the Koreans' bodies in the vicinity of the construction site.
					
					 When they arrested the fleers, they mercilessly shot them to death.
					
					 On the plea of keeping secret, they massacred over 180 Koreans who were mobilized to build a bedroom of King Hirohito.
					
					 Such crime committed by Japan against Koreans is no more than a tip of iceberg.
					
					 Japan should opt for settling its crime-woven past at an early date, mindful that it can never evade from the responsibility for the tremendous crimes it committed against the Koreans.

articles.title: Autumn Campaign for Land Management Brisk in North Phyongan Province
articles.content:
Autumn Campaign for Land Management Brisk in North Phyongan Province
Sinuiju, November 17 (KCNA) -- Many successes were achieved in North Phyongan Province through a brisk autumn campaign for land management.
					 Thousands of boundary stones and signposts and danger prevention walls extending hundreds of meters have been set up in Sakju and Cholsan counties.
					
					 Several bridges were constructed and a road extending several km was paved in Uiju County.
					
					 Officials and working people removed over 35 000 cubic meters of earth from a canal bed in Sinuiju, remarkably lowing its water level.
					
					 Kwaksan County completed the project for protecting the River Yongchon from any flooding and reinforced the 20 odd km-long bank.
					
					 The province produced saplings of various good species including larch trees and pine-nut trees.
					
					 Lots of new dwelling houses appeared in Yomju County and service and welfare establishments in Changsong and Sindo counties.
					
					 Projects for face-lifting the township areas and rural dwelling houses are making brisk headway in Tongrim, Thaechon and other counties.

articles.title: DPRK's Households Busy with Making Kimchi
articles.content:
DPRK's Households Busy with Making Kimchi
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- Households in the DPRK are nowadays busy with making Kimchi.
					 From olden times, the Korean people have traditionally made Kimchi before beginning of winter and taken it until spring the next year.
					
					 According to "Tonggukrisanggukjip", a book compiled in the mid-13th century, the Koreans took in winter salted radish in storage.
					
					 Through "Tongguksesigi", a historical book, one can know that the Koreans have from long ago taken Kimchi of the present-day kind in winter season.
					
					 Kimchi includes unsliced cabbage kimchi, radishes pickled in salt water, kimchi wrapped in large cabbage leaves, diced radish pickles and mustard kimchi.
					
					 Cookeries of Kimchi are a little different according to localities and families.
					
					 Kimchi is a cuisine peculiar to the Korean people.
					
					 Kimchi making has been already streamlined, but housewives like to make it on their own hands.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Warmongers' Saber-rattling
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Warmongers' Saber-rattling
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are staging the largest-scale war exercises 2014-Hoguk with more than 330 000 troops involved from Nov. 10.
					 They kicked off a joint landing drill in the area of Phohang of North Kyongsang Province from Nov. 15 with the involvement of the three services of huge armed forces and the marine corps. 
					
					 This is a revelation of extreme confrontation with the DPRK and the deliberate moves to deteriorate the inter-Korean relations, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The present ruling forces of south Korea have persistently sought confrontation and war, not dialogue and the improvement of relations between the north and the south.
					
					 They have never respected the DPRK, the dialogue partner, but only sought to do harm to it by force of arms.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that such bellicose action posing a serious threat to the dialogue partner and escalating the military tension is not for the dialogue and improvement of relations between the north and the south.
					
					 The warmongers are working hard to cover up the aggressive and provocative nature of Hoguk drills while crying out for the "establishment of military posture" to cope with "provocation" from someone.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are talking about "local war provocation" and "all-out war" of someone, but such wicked artifice can never help them cover up their provocative and bellicose nature.
					
					 The army and the people of the DPRK want detente and peace on the Korean Peninsula, but they will take a resolute military counteraction if the south Korean authorities dare hurt the DPRK even a bit, being buoyed by foolish daydream.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Suppressing Media
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Suppressing Media
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo in an article on Nov. 14 denounced the regime for suppressing media.
					 The present regime's clampdown on media has become more serious than the one by the past Lee Myung Bak regime, the article noted, adding:
					
					 The prosecution sentenced Paek Un Jong, an editor of the internet paper Voice of Seoul, to 6 years in prison and confiscated his property for the mere reason that he chided the present chief executive.
					
					 It took such action after suppressing him for posting on a website an article titled "Suspicions about Park Geun Hye's declaration of her candidacy for the presidential election" carried by a U.S. paper in July, 2012.
					
					 Recalling that many citizens and students were indicted and tried on unreasonable charges, the article accused the regime of gagging those informing the public of truth.
					
					 It demanded the regime immediately stop its unjust clampdown on progressive media persons and those staging actions for justice.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Blagobeshensk City of Amur Region of Russia on Nov. 10.
					 A. I. Donchenko, chairman of the Russian Blagobeshensk Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from Nov. 10 to Dec. 17 and decided to hold political and cultural events including seminar, book and photo exhibition and film show in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Romania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Romania
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- A Romanian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Nov. 7.
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Party for the Socialist Choice of Romania, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from Nov. 20 to Dec. 17 and decided to give wide publicity to the exploits of Kim Jong Il and organize political and cultural events including a remembrance meeting, seminar and book and photo exhibition in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Czech Republic
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- A committee of the Czech Republic for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Nov. 10. 
					 Jaroslav Kafka, chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from Nov. 10 to Dec. 17 and decided to organize political and cultural events including a remembrance meeting, seminar and photo exhibition in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in DR Congo
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house in DR Congo on Nov. 7. 
					 The work published on Nov. 1, Juche 83 (1994) deals with the idea that Korean-style socialism based on the Juche-oriented socialist theory is the most scientific and vital one and clearly indicates the principled matters arising in defending socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Kuwaiti Personage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Kuwaiti Personage
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- Yousef Al Amiri, president of Kuwait House of Works who doubles as chairman of the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association, made public a statement on Nov. 11 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise. 
					 The Korean people and the world progressives are to greet the 3rd anniversary of his demise on December 17, the president said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the great politician and strategist as he built the DPRK into a powerful state of single-minded unity and a nuclear power and the defender of justice and peace as he led the global cause of independence to victory. 
					
					 The world progressives are still cherishing in their mind the venerable image and august name of Kim Jong Il who performed great exploits before the times, history and humankind.
					
					 Thanks to his independent politics and Songun policy the DPRK has emerged as a powerful and independent fortress standing against imperialism which no one dares provoke and has performed a guiding role in the struggle for global peace and security.
					
					 Now the DPRK is successfully carrying forward the idea, cause and behests of the preceding leaders under the tested leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, great Songun brilliant commander.
					
					 I pay high respect to Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Combinado de Elaboracion Alimentaria de unidad 534 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Combinado de Elaboracion Alimentaria de unidad 534 de EPC
Pyongyang, 17 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el Combinado de Elaboracion Alimentaria, adscrito a la unidad 534 del EPC, donde se realizo en el maximo nivel la modernizacion.
					Presenciando el panorama del combinado, el Mariscal dijo que son vistosas las paredes de todos los edificios ataviadas con los azulejos. Anadio que se renovo completamente el aspecto de la fabrica sin ocultar la alegria por su visita de orientacion.
					
					Mirando los arboles de caqui que cubren el recinto de la fabrica con sus frutas, lo califico de un panorama peculiar que hace mas magnifico el aspecto del combinado modernizado como evaluo el Dirigente Kim Jong Il ante la reforestacion de esa fabrica.
					
					Apunto que los funcionarios y empleados de la unidad 534 del EPC y de la fabrica en cuestion y los cientificos y tecnicos de las unidades vinculadas habian cumplido con excelencia las tareas de modernizacion dadas por el mismo durante su visita anterior hecha en mayo del ano pasado y elogio que la fabrica es digno objeto de creacion patriotica preparado gracias al poderio de la gran unidad de los militares y civiles.
					
					Se sentiria mas satisfecho si lo hubiera visto el Dirigente, quien hizo reconstruir esa fabrica, que antes se dedicaba solamente a la refrigeracion y saladura del pescado, como una base universal de elaboracion alimentaria y se quedaba contento diciendo que podia suministrar a los uniformados mucho mas los alimentos basicos, dijo el Mariscal y asevero que esa fabrica le hace mas infinita la anoranza hacia el Dirigente.
					
					Se entero en detalles del estado de modernizacion recorriendo el taller de alimentos basicos, el de elaboracion de maiz, el de descascarillado, el de elaboracion de verduras y el de arroz cocido al instante.
					
					Evaluo que son magnificos el sistema de administracion unificada sobre las actividades de produccion y gestion informatizadas e intelectualizadas al maximo y los procesos de produccion automatizada completamente y agrego que ahora el trabajo se ha hecho una cancion y alegria.
					
					Senalo que la modernizacion de todos los procesos desde la inversion de materias primas hasta el envio de las mercancias, permitio  aumentar la cantidad y calidad de produccion de los alimentos ahorrando las manos de la obra y puntualizo que se puede garantizar por completo la seguridad higienica de los productos gracias a la esterilizacion sin polvo del ambiente del trabajo.
					
					El Mariscal dio revista a los alimentos de diversos generos producidos por la fabrica.
					
					Me gustaron mucho las sopas hechas con la pasta de soya de la Fabrica 20 de Febrero del EPC y me dijeron que la pasta de este combinado es la mas sabrosa y voy a probarla sin falta, senalo.
					
					Anteriormente, no ha parado ni un dia la produccion del combinado bajo la atencion especial del Dirigente, recordo e instruyo glorificar para siempre las hazanas de el, que produjo una revolucion en la produccion de alimentos basicos, al normalizar en alto nivel la produccion, puesto que este combinado fue modernizado segun la norma definida por el partido.
					
					El Comandante Supremo prometio resolver personalmente los problemas que surjan en las actividades administrativas de la fabrica, incluso las materias primas.
					
					Satisfecho por el recorrido, dijo que este ano ha sido el que ha consolidado la base de autoabastecimiento al modernizar con vistas al futuro las bases de intendencia del EPC, inclusive este combinado.
					
					El EPC esta al frente tambien de la industria de elaboracion de alimentos, apunto y ratifico que el PTC tiene el tradicional modo de trabajo de crear primero la unidad ejemplar y generalizar su ejemplo.
					
					Ordeno que todas las unidades civiles, sobre todo, las fabricas alimentarias, aprendan el modo de trabajo del EPC y dinamicen la campana de modernizacion.
					
					Es importante tener la postura y posicion autoctonas sobre la modernizacion, puntualizo y destaco la necesidad de impulsar esa labor con alta dignidad nacional y gran patriotismo.
					
					Senalo que son inagotables la inteligencia creativa y la pasion de los coreanos y exhorto a trabajar con meta elevada y ambicion de superar el nivel mundial.
					
					En esta ocasion, el Mariscal fue acompanado por el vicemariscal del EPC, Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres, So Hong Chan, primer viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.

articles.title: Parte de Pyongyang hacia Rusia enviado especial de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Parte de Pyongyang hacia Rusia enviado especial de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 17 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, partio el dia 17 de esta capital por avion especial para realizar una visita a la Federacion Rusa en calidad de enviado especial del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					Le acompanan el primer viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores, Kim Kye Gwan, el subjefe del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, No Kwang Chol, el subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, Ri Yong Chol, el viceministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, Ri Kwang Gun y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					Les despidieron en el aeropuerto internacional de Pyongyang el jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, vicemariscal Hwang Pyong So, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, el canciller Ri Su Yong, el ministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, Ri Ryong Nam, el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Song Nam y el embajador ruso acreditado en Corea, Alexandr Timonin.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al sultan de Oman
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al sultan de Oman
Pyongyang, 17 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 17 un mensaje de felicitacion al sultan de Oman, Qaboos Bin Said Al Said, con motivo del dia nacional de este pais. 
					Convencido de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises seguiran desarrollandose favorablemente, el remitente desea al mandatario y pueblo omanies siempre exitos en sus trabajos para construir un Oman moderno y prospero.

articles.title: Persistas coreanos ganan 12 medallas de oro en Campeonato Mundial de Levantamiento de Pesas 2014
articles.content:
Persistas coreanos ganan 12 medallas de oro en Campeonato Mundial de Levantamiento de Pesas 2014
Pyongyang, 17 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Los pesistas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea obtuvieron 12 medallas de oro de entre 45 medallas de oro en 15 divisiones (8 de masculino y 7 de femenino), asi que ocuparon el primer lugar en el orden de paises del campeonato.
					Om Yun Chol, pesista del Conjunto Deportivo Amnokgang, logro en la division de 56kg (m) la primera medalla de oro y se ha hecho otra vez campeon del mundo.
					
					El pesista del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril, Kim Un Guk, quien renovo en los XVII Juegos Asiaticos el record mundial, obtuvo 3 medallas de oro en la division de 62kg (m).
					
					Ryo Un Hui se hizo campeona en la division de 69kg (f) al ganar en total 3 medallas de oro.
					
					Ri Jong Hwa y Kim Kwang Song se clasificaron primeros en envion de la division de 58kg (f) y 77kg (m), respectivamente y Kim Un Ju logro las medallas de oro en envion y en total en la division de 75kg (f).

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia ejercicios de guerra "Hoguk 2014" en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia ejercicios de guerra "Hoguk 2014" en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 17 de noviembre (ACNC) -- A partir del dia 10, los titeres surcoreanos libran los ejercicios de guerra "Hoguk 2014" movilizando a mas de 330 mil efectivos.
					Desde el dia 15, iniciaron en la zona de Phohang de la provincia de Kyongsang del Norte los ejercicios conjuntos de desembarco de gran tamano en que se incorporan enormes fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas e infantes de marina.
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un articulo individual difundido este lunes, senala que esto es la manifestacion de extremada conciencia conflictiva a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea e intencional maniobra para romper las relaciones intercoreanas, y continua:
					
					Las fuerzas surcoreanas en el poder actual no persiguieron el dialogo ni la mejora de relaciones con la RPDC sino la confrontacion y la guerra.
					
					Ellas no respetaron nunca a la RPDC, contraparte del dialogo, y aguardaron la oportunidad para calumniarla y atacarla con fuerzas armadas.
					
					Esta locura belicosa, que amenaza gravemente a su contraparte y agrava la tension militar, no es para el dialogo ni para la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Ahora, los belicistas intentan ocultar el caracter agresivo y provocativo de la maniobra militar, diciendo que esta hace falta para  "establecer la disposicion militar" para hacer frente a la "provocacion" de alguien.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no pueden ocultar su naturaleza provocativa y belicosa con las expresiones como "provocacion local" de alguien y el "estado de guerra total".
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea desean el relajamiento de la tension y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Pero, si las autoridades surcoreanas se atreven a atentar contra la RPDC, el ejercito y el pueblo de esta tomaran rotundas contramedidas militares.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica el trafico de armas entre EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica el trafico de armas entre EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 17 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, Estados Unidos decidio vender al Sur de Corea 136 unidades de "PAC-3". Este hecho revela por si solo por que el imperio y sus titeres surcoreanos dilataron la transferencia del mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra.
					Asi comienza el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 16 y continua:
					
					El Sur de Corea debe aumentar las fuerzas armadas y comprar los armamentos de fabricacion norteamericana bajo el pretexto de la "amenaza" proveniente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, esto es la siniestra intencion de los gobernantes estadounidenses.
					
					Ahora, los complejos de industria belica de EE.UU. estan contentos por la posibilidad de ganar fabulosos fondos gracias al aplazamiento de traspaso del mando de operaciones en el Sur de Corea.
					
					Indudablemente, las companias norteamericanas Lockheed Martin y Radian se enfrascaran en la produccion de armamentos mortiferos para venderlos a los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Lo que quiere ver el imperio es el enfrentamiento fratricida entre los coreanos.
					
					El trafico de armamentos entre el agresor yanqui y los vendepatrias surcoreanos causa vehemente indignacion de toda la nacion coreana. 
					
					Los hechos mencionados comprueban el caracter justo del aumento de disuasivo nuclear por parte de la RPDC que seguira haciendolo.
